channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Checkout
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Samsung Checkout

item.title: CVE-2022-36839|2024-08-03T10:14:28.489Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20checkout
item.description: SQL injection vulnerability via IAPService in Samsung Checkout prior to version 5.0.53.1 allows attackers to access IAP information.

item.title: CVE-2022-39878|2024-08-03T12:07:42.959Z -- samsung%20mobile -- samsung%20checkout
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Samsung Checkout prior to version 5.0.55.3 allows attackers to access sensitive information via implicit intent broadcast.
